com.socialize.ui.slider

Interface ActionBarSliderItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSliderItem, CommentEntrySliderItem

    public interface ActionBarSliderItem
    Author:
    Jason Polites

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getIconImage() 
      String getId() 
      int getSliderContentHeight()
      Returns height of the slider content in pixels, or -1 for whole screen.
      ActionBarSliderView.DisplayState getStartPosition()
      If true the slider can be maximized.
      String getTitle() 
      View getView()
      Returns the view to be displayed in the slider.
      boolean isPeekOnClose()
      If false the slider closes when restored either from maximized position, or restored position.
      void onClear(ActionBarSliderView slider)
      Clears the content of the item.
      void onClose(ActionBarSliderView slider) 
      void onCreate(ActionBarSliderView slider) 
      void onOpen(ActionBarSliderView slider) 
      void onUpdate(ActionBarSliderView slider)
      Informs the slider that an update may be required
